5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Mas’ud that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever recites the last two Verses of Surat Al-Baqarah at night, that will be sufficient for him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا يُرْجَى أَنْ يَكْفِيَ مِنْ قِيَامِ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about what it is hoped will suffice for the night Prayer
